template.name: reqprop
template.description: Controller "Request Property" that allows public get but protected set with a private member variable

variable.name: FIELD_DESCRIPTION
variable.defaultValue: "Stores the parsed and type converted value from the raw web request"

variable.name: SETTER_RESPONSIBLE_FOR
variable.expression: concat("This method is responsible for parsing the raw request value into the correct type.")

variable.name: SETTER_CANNOT_PARSE
variable.expression: concat("If the parameter is not already, or cannot be converted into, a value of type '", TYPE_NAME, "'\n\t * then $this->", VALUE_NAME," is set to the default value of '", INITIAL_VALUE,"'.")

variable.name: SETTER_DOES_NOT_VALIDATE
variable.defaultValue: "This method does not attempt to validate the parsed value."

variable.name: SETTER_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION
variable.defaultValue: "A raw value from the web request"

variable.name: GETTER_DESCRIPTION
variable.expression: concat("The get method for the parse ", PROPERTY_NAME," or its default value of '", INITIAL_VALUE,"'.")

template.name: nprop

variable.name: NO_VALUE
variable.expression: enum(concat(" or ", INITIAL_VALUE ," for no value."), ".")

variable.name: GETTER_DESCRIPTION
variable.expression: concat("Accessor method to get the ", PROPERTY_NAME," value.")

variable.name: GETTER_RETURN_DESCRIPTION
variable.expression: enum(concat(VALID_VALUES, NO_VALUE), concat("The current value of ", PROPERTY_NAME,NO_VALUE))

variable.name: SETTER_DESCRIPTION
variable.expression: concat("Fluent accessor method to set the ", PROPERTY_NAME," value.")

variable.name: SETTER_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION
variable.expression: enum(concat(VALID_VALUES, NO_VALUE), concat("A value to be converted to ", TYPE_NAME," type", NO_VALUE))

template.name: tprop

variable.name: FIELD_DESCRIPTION
variable.expression: concat("The value managed by the ", PROPERTY_NAME, " accessor methods.")

variable.name: SETTER_DESCRIPTION
variable.expression: concat("Fluent accessor method to get ", PROPERTY_NAME," value.")

variable.name: SETTER_PARAMETER_DESCRIPTION
variable.expression: concat("The value to be managed by the ", PROPERTY_NAME, " property.")

variable.name: GETTER_DESCRIPTION
variable.expression: concat("Accessor method to set ", PROPERTY_NAME," value.")

variable.name: GETTER_RETURN_DESCRIPTION
variable.expression: concat("The current value of the ", PROPERTY_NAME," property.")

variable.name: GROOVY
variable.expression: groovyScript("def parameters=''; def result='log.info(\"'+_2+'\",\"'; _1.each { parameters+=it+':${'+it+'},'}; result+=parameters[0..-2]+'\")'; return result",methodParameters(),methodName())

template.name: managedby
template.value: @internal Do not directly reference this field. It's value is maaged by $METHOD_NAME$.
